Description: Verify Adding Multiple Items to Cart and Proceeding to Checkout
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: Login at Page home --> navigate to Page inventory html
step 3: At Page inventory html click on button add to cart sauce labs bolt t shirt
step 4: At Page inventory html click on button add to cart sauce labs bike light
step 5: At Page inventory html click on hyperlink object --> navigate to Page cart html
step 6: At Page cart html click on button checkout --> navigate to Page checkout-step-one html
step 7: At Page checkout-step-one html input on input first name
step 8: At Page checkout-step-one html input on input last name
step 9: At Page checkout-step-one html input on input postal code
step 10: At Page checkout-step-one html click on input continue --> navigate to Page checkout-step-two html
step 11: Add visual checkpoint at Page checkout-step-two html
